record.title: ORDER FOR THE RECORD TO REMAIN OPEN
record.narrative:
ORDER FOR THE RECORD TO REMAIN OPEN -- (Senate - September 28, 2007)

[Page: S12340]

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that the Record remain open today until 2 p.m. for the submission of statements and cosponsorships.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
